Question: What is the summary associated with the movie 'Dangal', released in 2016?
Options:
A. A story about a father training his daughters to become world-class wrestlers.
B. A romantic comedy about two people falling in love at a wrestling match.
C. A documentary on the history of wrestling in India.
D. A thriller involving a wrestling championship gone wrong.
Answer: A story about a father training his daughters to become world-class wrestlers.
